channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 02:44 Air alert in Chernihiv region. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 游댮 02:44 Air alert in Chernihiv region. Stay tuned for further reports. #햖햣햫햦햡햦쒬혧햨햟_쮏쐃햟혜혝혧 This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
